subtitle: Serve these rolls either with soup or fill them with burgers or hot dogs.

method.text: Sieve the flour and salt together into a warm bowl. Rub in the butter and stir in the yeast. Add the garlic and chopped sun-dried tomatoes. Add up to 125-150 ml warm water to form a soft, but not sticky dough.

Knead on a lightly floured surface for 5 min. Divide the dough into 12 and shape into 10 cm rolls. Make 3 deep scissor snips down the length of each roll. Place on a lightly oiled baking sheet. Cover with oiled cling film. Leave in a warm place until double in size.
Brush the rolls with beaten egg. Sprinkle sesame seeds over the top. Bake for about 12 min.

title: Tomato and garlic mini rolls
